short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Vectoria Extension shows if the product or company whose website you are visiting is is sustainable or not.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Vectoria.org is a Decentralized Zero Party Sustainability Data Platform.
We are a community of people committed to accelerate transition to sustainability by 2035. To influence economic activity we provide unique Premium Sustainability Zero Party Data. We classify companies, products and brands based on their sustainability efforts and mark them as Compatible or Not Compatible with Sustainability filters defined by Community. Our platform empowers every citizen to directly connect with companies sharing same sustainability values. It facilitates the access to citizenâ€™s personal data with no middle man on a C2B transaction. Online services can now personalize offering with Compatible products and brands as per user sustainability profile.
